name: Meiling's Shanghai Teahouse!
description:
Help Sakuya's Sisyphus reincarnation operate Meiling's teahouse for just 3 customers that will never ever leave!

The theme is Shanghai teahouse ~ Chinese tea!

Stack dishes and teapots into towers to get rid of them by plunging them into the dishwasher

LMB - Grab a dish
E and Q - rotate a dish

Made by:
me
a frien that didn't want to be mentioned

Special thanks to ZUN!
